Class BulletFactory

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.actors.Projectile.BulletFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectFactory<Projectile>
public class BulletFactory extends Object implements ObjectFactory<Projectile>
A factory class for creating and resetting projectiles of different types. Implements the ObjectFactory interface for Projectile objects. Provides a standardized way to instantiate and reuse projectile objects for various types such as "user", "enemy", "boss", and "bossTwo".

  • Field Details

    • type

      private final String type
      The type of projectile to be created. Supported types include:
      • "user" - A UserProjectile created at (0, 0).
      • "enemy" - An EnemyProjectile created at (0, 0).
      • "boss" - A BossProjectile created at (0, y).
      • "bossTwo" - A BossTwoProjectile created at (0, y).

  • Constructor Details

    • BulletFactory

      public BulletFactory(String type)
      Constructs a BulletFactory with the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of projectile this factory will produce. Must be one of "user", "enemy", "boss", or "bossTwo".

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Projectile create()
      Creates a new instance of a projectile based on the factory's type.
      Specified by:
      create in interface ObjectFactory<Projectile>
      Returns:
      a new Projectile instance corresponding to the specified type. Returns null if the type is not recognized.

    • reset

      public void reset(Projectile projectile)
      Resets the given projectile to its default state, making it reusable. Delegates the reset operation to the Projectile.reset() method.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface ObjectFactory<Projectile>
      Parameters:
      projectile - the Projectile instance to reset. Must not be null.
